title: Sprout summoner icon disabled?
body:
I just logged into the LoL client (I have had the Beta/alpha client for a week or so now) and I just saw that my summoner icon wasn't the little green plant (sprout) anymore. It has been that pretty much ever since I created the account and now when I go to click on it, it selects it but I can't hit the save button because it is greyed out and just won't save it. However for every other icon I have tried it has worked and let me save it. Is this a bug for just the new Client or has something happened to that one particular icon and will it get fixed? Not exactly a game-changing issue but it is just kinda weird. Thank you. :)

UPDATE 1: I see here on the boards my icon is still the sprout soo ... yea still weird. 

UPDATE 2: just logged into the client again and now I can change my icon to the spout and save it so its all working again. sorry for this. Thanks anyway.

replies.body: There has been an issue with some icons not displaying correctly on the new client. It's only a display issue, and everyone else can still see your icon, it just doesn't show up properly for you. Usually a restart will fix the issue. Likely you weren't able to select it because it was already selected :)
Oh thank you! Thank makes a lot of sense :) good to have that all cleared up.
